parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate or party.  It promotes general civic engagement and encourages informed voting.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its message is clearly intended for a broad audience, not a specific individual or small group.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is not to influence the vote for a particular candidate. Instead, it aims to encourage voter participation and informed decision-making by promoting access to information through books. The post promotes reading as a means of becoming informed, not advocating for a specific candidate or party.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post could be considered a form of public service announcement or citizens' journalism, aiming to educate and inform the public about the importance of informed voting. It does not promote a specific political agenda or candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion about any candidate or party. It presents a neutral message encouraging informed voting.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>495828770135590</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post by Cărțurești promotes reading and informed voting without endorsing any specific candidate or party.  While the post is related to the electoral process, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  It lacks direct reference to a candidate (a), its objective is not to influence votes for a specific candidate (c), and it falls within the bounds of providing information to the public (d). The post encourages informed participation, which is a positive contribution to the democratic process, not a violation of electoral laws.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Cărțurești</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
